title: Setting Your International Allocation
description: A 60-second lesson on Setting Your International Allocation.

hook.text: Vanguard's target-date funds allocate 40% internationally. Many US investors hold less than 15%. Who's right?

buildup.text: Global market cap weights suggest about 40% non-US equity. Home-bias-adjusted models suggest 20-40%.

discovery.text: Your ideal allocation depends on risk tolerance, time horizon, income currency, and tax situation.
